column5: Another Musky opener for some regions only. Where is everyone going? I will be hitting my favorite kawartha lake Saturday for a full day of Musky Hunting. Good luck to all musky anglers. It is going to be HOT. We will see if it turns the fish on. Cheers AL
Right in back yard!!!  Was down there tonight talking to them  They have no excuses now........   They have been warned im coming for them !!!

3 days on the French (Main Channel)  I just want one, or two, or perhaps 3?  Honestly, I just wanna know that my tactics and research into what to fish actually works.. a few follows would really be good for my first official muskie outing.

Its gonna be another couple sleepless nights waiting for the day to finally get here for me.  I'll be the guy on sturgeon, with the big one on  I'm all rigged and ready to go!!  CAN'T FREAKIN WAIT!!!  Sinker
I'll be on Sturgeon as well. If you see two Sportspals come say hello .
LIAR!!!  Musky doesn't open till the 21st.  Where I am anyways.  Heck the pike haven't even been on yet.  I sure hope bass season isn't delayed the same way.
heading up to Moira.  Can't wait.  Is it wrong to start sharpening hooks in March?
Where abouts in moria ya fishing? River or lake?
Mostly in the lake......some money spots on the river.  Look a blue lund on openning day

well since I can't head to camp for a bit because of work and kids and stuff, gonna hit the Upper Niagara up from shore in a couple spots just to humour myself, may put the boat in, not sure yet may try to hit a couple inland spots up.  Then my tactics cahnge to fishing for giants at ther trailer
I will be on sturgeon sat and sunday!!
its soon. PLEASE check your safety gear guys. i want to read about fun fishing, not tragedys and mis fortunes.
Pigeon on Saturday and Scugog on Sunday , hopefully get into some fish on both days.
Jasonfisher, do you have a 90 on you boat, if so you launched before me a couple weeks ago.
No .....It's not my boat and he has a 150 Honda 4 stroke
I will be on lake, too.
Kawarthas, the whole weekend - firing bucktails and shooting video!

I"ll do that for sure. I usually hit the area you do at somepoint during the day. As a matter of fact, I'm sure I've seen you guys out there with a fish on......I think it was a sportspal and a kayak that day?  Anyways, now that i know who you are, I'll say HI for sure  Sinker
